content: World of Warcraft is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) released in 2004 by Blizzard Entertainment.
WoW has multiple expansions including The Burning Crusade, Wrath of the Lich King, Cataclysm, Mists of Pandaria, Warlords of Draenor, Legion, Battle for Azeroth, Shadowlands, and Dragonflight.

Players can choose from various races and classes. Alliance races include Humans, Dwarves, Night Elves, Gnomes, Draenei, and Worgen. Horde races include Orcs, Undead, Tauren, Trolls, Blood Elves, and Goblins.
The main classes in WoW are Warrior, Paladin, Hunter, Rogue, Priest, Death Knight, Shaman, Mage, Warlock, Monk, Druid, Demon Hunter, and Evoker.
Azeroth is the main world in World of Warcraft, consisting of the continents of Eastern Kingdoms and Kalimdor.
Raids are endgame PvE content that require groups of 10-30 players to defeat powerful bosses for epic loot.
PvP (Player versus Player) includes battlegrounds, arenas, and open world combat.

Professions allow players to gather resources and craft items. Primary professions include Mining, Herbalism, Skinning, Alchemy, Blacksmithing, Engineering, Enchanting, Inscription, Jewelcrafting, Leatherworking, and Tailoring.
